name: Imperium
overview: You are Roberto and astronaut of the Imperium with a difficult task to perform. You must reach Antezium, the location of the alien command to destroy it. The aliens guarding Antezium command have the touch of death, so they must be avoided at all costs. Run, duck and jump to avoid them and make your way to the ship. The road will be much longer and more difficult than expected. And all man's hope is on your shoulders. Published in Digital Marketing PD #021 in Europe and Supplementi Edigamma/pubblirome - big 100 (1987) and Super C64 e C128 n.21 (marzo 1988) in Italy under the name Antezium.
